categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Ambush at Vale was a battle that occurred in 13 BBY. Imperial Ace Shea Hublin's squadron, which served as part of Grand Moff Tarkin's fleet in Oversector Outer, was ambushed by Rebels at Vale. Hublin lost his leg and half of his right arm in the battle. He was later transferred to line command position in the Star Destroyer Kabalian Cross.
